column3: What is a woman ? I'm not a biologist.

Me: ""I ride so I can go up and then down""Japanese riders:  ""Nature is as fierce as a nail but as delicate as a finger. Nature is as exquisite as downy hair but as brawny as an arm. Our physical being is a mirror reflecting Nature. If one can love oneself one cannot possibly hate Nature""
Evertytime is see this im like yeah Lets ride 120km, when on the bike after 30km im like yeah, whatever... Lets go home
This was beautiful. It summed up every hard ride up a mountain I every had. Why do you do it?....... so I can go down the other side.
Epic video. Epic rides.
Rapha are doing so much to turn cycling from what used to be a popular sport for everyone into this pretentious past-time for wealthy millennnials.

I made one's flesh creep... That's beautiful film.

Woah Treks slipping into a Rapha vid? Game is slippin' boys, when you are letting decidedly pedestrian Lance bikes into your hard-to-attain lineup. Those aren't going to inspire people to buy $150 mitts.Also, nice! You did slip one beardork in. That almost offsets the Treks.
Why Trek? The dirtiest of all bike brands... but I would pay to be on a Rapha movie!
Highly inspirational video.
Evolve your style. Relying on slow motion so much it lazy and dull.
Please, please try and explore new edit techniques. You rely on slow motion so much. It's dull. I appreciate you have a style but how about evolving it?
